U

updateAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c195.controller.editAppointmentController
On pressing "save" all the variables are assigned to the appropriate dropdowns or textbox values The date picker and all the hour/min dropdowns are converted to Strings and concatenated together to form the whole Datetime value required by the database There is a checker for any empty boxes as well as checking if the selected appointment date/time conflicts with business hours or an already existing appointments.
updateAppointmentSQL(int, String, String, String, String, String, String, int, String) - Static method in class project.c195.helpers.appointmentDataSQL
Update the existing selected appointment using the data provided from editAppointmentController
updateCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c195.controller.editCustomerController
This assigns the variables with the corresponding values in each textbox/dropdown.
updateCustomerSQL(int, String, String, String, String, int, String) - Static method in class project.c195.helpers.customerDataSQL
This sends an update SQL statement to the database where the selected customer's data will be updated with the provided data from the editCustomerMenu.
